LenovoMemoryProperties.description: This is the schema definition for the LenovoMemory resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

FruPartNumber.description: The FRU part number of this memory.

HealthStatusString.description: The Health status of the memory. Only available for persistent memory.

PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.description: Percentage for remaining life of the memory. Only available for persistent memory.

SecurityStateString.description: The security state of the memory. Only available for persistent memory.

title: #LenovoMemory.v1_0_0
